result.name: Academisch Medisch Centrum
result.product.lmng_description: Het A1 Desktoppakket bestaat uit een bundel van Microsoft producten. Voor het overzicht van de producten zie de uitgebreide productinformatie.
result.product.lmng_descriptionlong:
Het Desktop Pakket bestaat uit de volgende producten:

- Desktop Education with Enterprise CAL:
  - Windows Enterprise Upgrade (*)
  - Microsoft Office Professional Plus
  - Microsoft Office for Mac Professional Edition
  - Microsoft Enterprise CAL Suite:
    - Microsoft Exchange Server Enterprise CAL
    - Microsoft Exchange Server Standard CAL
    - Microsoft Forefront Protection Suite:
        - Microsoft Forefront Client Security
        - Microsoft Forefront Online Protection for Exchange Server
        - Microsoft Forefront Protection for Exchange Server
        - Microsoft Forefront Security for Office Communications Server
        - Microsoft Forefront Threat Management Gateway Web Protection Service
        - Microsoft Forefront Protection for SharePoint
        - Microsoft Forefront Unified Access Gateway CAL
    - Microsoft Lync Server Enterprise CAL
    - Microsoft Lync Server Plus CAL(**)
    - Microsoft Lync Server Standard CAL
    - Microsoft SharePoint Enterprise CAL
    - Microsoft SharePoint Standard CAL
    - Microsoft System Center Client Management Suite Client Management License (CLM):
        - Microsoft System Center Operations Manager CLM
        - Microsoft System Center Data Protection Manager CLM
        - Microsoft System Center Service Manager CLM
 &
result.supplier.name: Microsoft B.V.
